Articles.Content: I've been here for a little under a month and I have to say that I absolutely love the community. Everyone has nice spirits and are always helping others out. I would like to introduce you to me, your new recruit to the KSP forums! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

I'm glad to see you're enjoying it here! KSP is my favorite gaming community, too. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Also, welcome!

Welcome to the forums! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)I know, I know, but better late than never...

Glad to hear you've been enjoying your time here. Hope to see you stick around and contribute your own measure of awesomeness to the community!

Thanks for saying hello. There is no doubt that this community has great qualities. I don't participate in online forums, with the exception of this one.

Happy landings!
Good to see you like us! We like you too! Lol
